author: desruisseaux
msg: Update for GeoAPI changes: replaced MD_CharacterSet code list by direct use of java.nio.charset.Charset.
The reason for this change is that ISO 19115:2003 defined its own code list for character sets, while
ISO 19115:2014 still define an MD_CharacterSetCode but the new definition does not enumerate any element
and instead refer to IANA registry (http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml).
Consequently there is no need anymore to handle the ISO 19115:2003 custom names in the Apache SIS API.
The java.nio.charset.Charset class use IANA names, so it is suitable for this new situation.

author: stefan2
msg: Bring build-svn-deps-win.pl up-to-date. Serf will still not build as-is.
* tools/dev/build-svn-deps-win.pl:
(set_defaults, SERF_VER): Upgrade serf dependency to 1.3.6.
(PCRE_VER): Upgrade PCRE dependency to 8.35.

in PCRE tests.

build_httpd): Add support for Visual Studio 2013
